p: DPPH (2,2-diphenyl-1-picrylhydrazyl) reduction assay confirmed that essential oil does not possess antioxidant activity, in fact on the contrary to known antioxidants as Trolox (ED 50 117.5 Î¼g/ml, ACR 0.0085), it was not identified the efficient dose (ED 50) of the essential oil of G. rosmarinifolia ( Table 4).
